ModuleDescription:
This module gives an introduction of microelectronic
devices deployed in modern gadgets/equipment, e.g.,
smartphones, wearable electronics and driverless cars.
These gadgets/equipment showcase how advanced
microelectronic technology has impacted our lives. The
working principles of these microelectronic devices will be
described. Specifications and key features of these devices
will also be analysed, so that students will learn how to apply
these devices for diverse applications in our everyday life.
